CustomField.description: This field specifies current status of the Attachment version whether the version is being uploaded or available. Also when a Attachment is archived all it's version records are marked as "Archived".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field specifies current status of the Attachment version whether the version is being uploaded or available. Also when a Attachment is archived all it's version records are marked as "Archived".
CustomField.label: Status
